Below is a recording of the 15 minute talk I gave at the SGDP centre on 10/07/2025 as part of their weekly seminar series. I discuss my first PhD project, which was an exploration of how gene-environment interactions in PTSD differ across traumatic experiences. Please forgive the audio quality.
